summary: A FedEx invoice dated February 19, 2001, for account holder Jeffrey E. Epstein, detailing shipping charges for 16 packages sent from his New York address to various individuals and properties, including Zorro Ranch and Ghislaine Maxwell. The document provides a record of financial transactions and shipping activity linked to Epstein's network.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: The primary account holder for the FedEx invoice; packages are shipped from his address at 457 Madison Ave, New York, NY.

persons.name: Mrs. Sherman
persons.context: Listed as a contact on the billing/shipping address for Jeffrey E. Epstein's FedEx account.

persons.name: James Harrison
persons.context: Recipient of a FedEx Priority Overnight envelope shipped from Jeffrey E. Epstein's address on February 8, 2001.

persons.name: John Harry Molda
persons.context: Recipient of a FedEx Priority Overnight envelope shipped from Jeffrey E. Epstein's address on February 9, 2001.

persons.name: Marc Lumberg
persons.context: Recipient of a FedEx Priority Overnight package shipped from Jeffrey E. Epstein's address on February 9, 2001.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Recipient of a FedEx Priority Overnight package shipped from Jeffrey E. Epstein's address to her Palm Beach, FL address on February 10, 2001.

persons.name: Eric Gany
persons.context: Recipient of two FedEx shipments (Standard Overnight and 2Day) from Jeffrey E. Epstein's address on February 13, 2001.

persons.name: Larry Morrison
persons.context: Co-recipient (with Eric Gany) of a FedEx Standard Overnight envelope shipped from Jeffrey E. Epstein's address on February 13, 2001.

persons.name: Dave Rodgers
persons.context: Recipient of a FedEx Standard Overnight envelope shipped from Jeffrey E. Epstein's address on February 14, 2001.

persons.name: Dave Arnold
persons.context: Co-recipient (with Dave Rodgers) of a FedEx Standard Overnight envelope shipped from Jeffrey E. Epstein's address on February 14, 2001.

connections.description: Epstein shipped a package to Maxwell's Palm Beach address, indicating a financial transaction for delivery services between them.
Epstein paid for a FedEx shipment to James Harrison, demonstrating a financial transaction for delivery.
Epstein paid for a FedEx shipment to Marc Lumberg, demonstrating a financial transaction for delivery.
Epstein paid for two separate FedEx shipments to Eric Gany, indicating repeated financial transactions for delivery.

events.title: Package to Zorro Ranch
events.description: A FedEx Express Saver package is shipped from Jeffrey Epstein's New York address to 'Zorro Ranch' in Stanley, NM.

events.title: Package to Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: A FedEx Priority Overnight package is shipped from Jeffrey Epstein's New York address to Ghislaine Maxwell's address in Palm Beach, FL.

locations: Zorro Ranch, 41 Zorro Ranch Rd, Stanley, NM 87058
358 El Brillo Way, Palm Beach, FL 33480
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's FedEx account was active in February 2001, with shipments originating from his New York address at 457 Madison Ave.
Multiple packages were shipped to Epstein's New Mexico property, 'Zorro Ranch'.
A package was shipped from Epstein to Ghislaine Maxwell at her Palm Beach, Florida address.
The invoice documents financial transactions for shipping to various individuals, including James Harrison, Marc Lumberg, and Eric Gany.
The document serves as a record of communication and material exchange within Epstein's network during this period.
